Want to transfer an edis account for a friend:

KVM - KVM MICRO HK: 128 MB RAM 1 GB HDD 1 IPv4 125 GB Traffic KVM based officially it is € 4,49 per month

You should be interested because for the renewal it is EUR 26.94 Annually (50% discount included).
